full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/18/2023 Hassomal Mulchand Gurbaxani 2039 E. Beverly Drive Pasadena California 91104 The American Embassy London, England. Dear Sirs: I wish to state the following under oath: 1. I, Hassomal Mulchand Gurbaxani, am the father-in-law of Mr. Naraindas Tolaram Sitlani. 2. I am the oldest living relative of my above named son-in-law. 3. My above named son-in-law was born on August 30, 1907 in Hyderabad, Sind. 4. The maiden name of my above named son-in-law'wamother was Kewalbai Navalrai Lalwani who is now dead. 5. The name of my above named son-in-law's father was Tolaram Gopaldas Sitlani who is now dead. 6. This affidavit of birth is being executed as a birth certificate is not available for my above named son-in-law. Jtm.Guhaxam' (Hanomal Gurbaxani Mulchand Hassomal Mulchand Gurbaxani
